Slogans.salesEverywhereDesc: Through our advanced platform, we ensure your products reach every customer anywhere with high efficiency and speed.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.intro: Find quick answers to common questions.
FAQ.q1: Which platforms do you integrate me with?
FAQ.a1: We integrate with leading e-commerce, POS, and delivery marketplaces. Full list coming soon.
FAQ.q2: Which delivery apps can I operate with you?
FAQ.a2: Major delivery apps in the Kingdom; we handle onboarding and menu sync.
FAQ.a3: We follow standardized, food-safe packaging procedures that preserve freshness and presentation.
FAQ.q4: How long does order preparation take?
FAQ.a4: Average prep time depends on complexity, typically between 10–25 minutes before handoff.
FAQ.q5: How long is intra-city delivery time?
FAQ.a5: Delivery time varies by area and traffic, generally 25–55 minutes after preparation.
FAQ.q6: Are there extra fees for Cash on Delivery?
FAQ.a6: A small handling fee may apply depending on the courier partner; we'll disclose it clearly.
FAQ.q7: Do I need a physical branch for delivery apps?
FAQ.a7: No physical branch is required; our cloud infrastructure represents you across channels.
FAQ.q8: If a customer doesn't receive a COD order, how is it handled?
FAQ.a8: We investigate, coordinate with the courier, and follow dispute protocols to minimize your loss.
FAQ.q9: How do I track my customers' orders?
FAQ.a9: You get a real-time dashboard with order statuses, timestamps, and performance metrics.

About.title: About Fly Kitchen
About.subtitle: Your branches closer to your customers
About.intro: We help store owners create a distributed network of branches across the Kingdom to reduce delivery distances and increase customer satisfaction.
About.mission: To empower businesses with scalable cloud branch infrastructure that eliminates geographical barriers and maximizes growth potential.
About.vision: To become the leading cloud branch network in the Middle East, enabling every brand to thrive in the digital economy.
About.value1Desc: Continuously advancing technology to streamline operations.
About.value2Desc: Maintaining the highest standards in food safety and service.
About.value3Desc: Building lasting relationships with our store partners.
About.value4Desc: Driving sustainable expansion for all stakeholders.
About.teamIntro: Meet the experts driving our vision forward.
About.reason1Desc: Successfully launched hundreds of cloud branch operations across the Kingdom.
About.reason2Desc: Advanced systems for inventory, orders, and analytics built for scale.
About.reason3Desc: From setup to ongoing support, we handle every aspect of your cloud branches.

Branches.title: Your Cloud Branches
Branches.description: Extensive geographic coverage for all Fly Kitchen branches across the Kingdom. Having multiple distributed branches provides greater geographic coverage in delivery apps.

Solutions.title: Problems that Fly Kitchen solves for you
Solutions.solution1Subtitle: We offer fixed prices regardless of how far customers are from your cloud branches!
Solutions.solution2Title: Lost control over order management during ad campaigns?
Solutions.solution2Subtitle: It's hard to focus on developing your online store project, especially if you spend all your time and effort on operations and order management. That's why you can rely on us completely!
Solutions.solution3Subtitle: We guarantee it for you without any additional cost!
Solutions.solution4Subtitle: We provide storage at different temperatures, whether frozen, chilled, or at room temperature.
